ygData.msgSnippet: I must learn both sides of my nature, I m a robot I was programed to learn, to adapt. Lunarpine s voice became stronger with each word, He knew that he was

"I must learn both sides of my nature, I'm a robot' I was programed 
to learn, to adapt." Lunarpine's voice became stronger with each 
word, He knew that he was doing the right thing going with Shadow 
Wing, and she knew it too."Take me to them it's time I faced my 
techno side."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> "It's not that.  It's that I know what I'm giving up.  I gave it up 
already. 
> I just remember how much it hurt to give it up.  And I know that 
asking you 
> to come with me is a lot to ask. If you say that you don't want to 
join me, 
> I'll understand completely."
> 
> ----Original Message---
> From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
> Date: Fri Jun 30, 2000 8:38pm
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> 
> 
> "you don't sound convinced by your own words, You know all to well
> the sacrifices to be made moving into a new environment. These are
> your friends, Things won't change with me around, I need thier help,
> not the other way around."
> Lunarpine was ashamed to admit it but he knew his presence wouldn't
> change the war. He knew that this was his environment, his very
> function was programmed for this land. Anywhere else he would be a
> liability, not an asset
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
